name: unreal-engine-mcp-server
title: Unreal Engine
description: A comprehensive Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that enables AI assistants to control Unreal Engine via Remote Control API. Built with TypeScript and designed for game development automation.

config.name: unreal-engine-mcp-server
config.description: Configure the connection to Unreal Engine Remote Control API

ue_host.description: Unreal Engine host address. Use: host.docker.internal for local UE on Windows/Mac Docker, 127.0.0.1 for Linux without Docker, or actual IP address (e.g., 192.168.1.100) for remote UE
